resources.string: Welcome to Mexico, and welcome to Abba Park. The nature reserve occupies 24 acres of the lush, stunning land of the Sierra del Tigre Mountains. You\'ll be surrounded by mountains, greenery, trees, rivers, and wildlife.
6 Constitucion Street, Centro, Concepcion de Buenos Aires, Mexico, ZP 49170

Our fully functioning farm is tended to by traditional practices passed down for generations. Drink fresh milk, pick your eggs for breakfast, and allow the kids and yourselves to play alongside the cows, goats, chickens, and horses that spend their lives at Abba Park.

Your cabin in the woods has large, sweeping ceilings, a wood fireplace, hot showers, and is lit with natural candlelight. Each brick was hand created, and that intentional foundation steeped in hundreds of years of tradition can be felt within the walls. There are 24 acres of land to explore.

We\'ll explore Mexican farming and cooking techniques that have been passed down for generations. On the farm made Pajarete / Breakfast / Cheese Factory / Tortilla factory / Adobe Factory / 4 hr $25.00
Mountain Biking Circuit / Guide shows you around \n 2 hrs $10
Dinner / Mariachi / Folkloric Dance / Cazuela (tequila drink. Vampiro). \n Minimum of 8 people. \n 3 HRS $100 USD
A massage by our in-house masseur. Book Online. \n Spa Service - Massage 1 hr $45
A DAY OF SONG AND DANCE
Try our authentic flag ( Tequila + Lemon + Sangrita ) Black Charro ! Original Vampire ! Learn how to prepare you own cazuela !
The chef Maurice Salgado challenges the most demanding palates around the world with his author fusion cuisine
Duration varies â€¢ 20 dls and up Our Ziplines circuit are just awesome !
Fire place, full private bathroom one or two bed, bbq area, camping equipment available just in the heart of the amazing forest !

Your cabin in the woods has large, sweeping ceilings, a wood fireplace, hot showers, and is lit with natural candlelight. Each brick was hand created, and that intentional foundation steeped in hundreds of years of tradition can be felt within the walls.

Your cabin in the woods has large, sweeping ceilings, a wood fireplace, hot showers, and is lit with natural candlelight. Each brick was hand created, and that intentional foundation steeped in hundreds of years of tradition can be felt within the walls.

Your cabin with two floors in the woods has large, sweeping ceilings, a wood fireplace, hot showers, and is lit with natural candlelight. Each brick was hand created, and that intentional foundation steeped in hundreds of years of tradition can be felt within the walls.

Your cabin in the woods has large, sweeping ceilings, a wood fireplace, two flors, two hot showers, and is lit with natural candlelight. Each brick was hand created, and that intentional foundation steeped in hundreds of years of tradition can be felt within the walls.
